title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from table show different formats in dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
1. Retrieve datetime values from a table.
2. Display the values in both a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
3. Compare the formats of the datetime values displayed in both items.
